definition: to go and visit in an official capacity or for investigation

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate
to make an official visit (often abroad)

sentences.english: In 1960 Khruschev headed a delegation to visit Indonesia and was royally treated by his host.
sentences.chinese: 率團出訪印度尼西亞，他受到了主人的盛情款待。

sentences.english: Jack dehorts me from visiting Israel.
sentences.chinese: 傑克勸阻我出訪以色列。

sentences.english: Shortly before I went abroad, this friend and I had been coeditor of a big book.
sentences.chinese: 出訪前夕，我還在與他合作主編一本大書。

sentences.english: The use of vehicles equipped with sirens will be rigorously controlled during official visits in order to prevent public disturbances.
sentences.chinese: 爲了避免擾民，軍委同志出訪時，嚴格控制使用警車。

sentences.english: What is your main objective of visiting the Netherland ?
sentences.chinese: 請問您出訪荷蘭的主要目的是什麼？

sentences.english: I'm speaking to you at the end of a long trip.
sentences.chinese: 我是在一次遠途出訪的結尾對你們發表演講。

sentences.english: That is the work that I will begin on this trip.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我要在本次出訪中開始做的工作。

sentences.english: Her visit comes after several weeks of political turmoil.
sentences.chinese: 她的出訪發生在政治混亂幾周之後。

sentences.english: President Obama will visit Ghana in July making his first trip to a sub-Sahara African nation since his  inauguration. David O'Byrne reports from the Ghanaian capital Accra.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬將首次出訪非洲，第一站是加納。

sentences.english: Obama was speaking in Jordan during his highly- publicized trip abroad.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬這次高調的出訪之旅已經到達約旦。

sentences.english: It is the first delegation of the ACWF-president level that has been to the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 這是全國婦聯主席首次率團出訪這兩個國家。

sentences.english: Concerns had been raised that the 72-year-old empress might not be up to the trip.
sentences.chinese: 72歲的美智子皇后能否出訪一直令人擔憂。

sentences.english: I am looking forward to our joint visit to Africa, as Horst has mentioned.
sentences.chinese: 正如霍斯特所說的那樣，我期待着我們共同出訪非洲。

sentences.english: The three visits by the China's special envoy on the Middle Eastissue have produced good results.
sentences.chinese: 中國中東問題特使已三次出訪中東，取得了良好效果。

sentences.english: A few years ago, I have worked as members of our city, education delegation visited Japan.
sentences.chinese: 幾年前，我曾作爲我們市教育考察團的成員出訪日本。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, President Bush was going out in full stride.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，老布什總統正在馬不停蹄地出訪。

definition: pay an official call/call on/visit in an official capacity
Lien Chan (1936-), Taiwanese politician, former vice-president and chairman of Guomintang
abbr. for 國際關係學院|国际关系学院[Guo2 ji4 Guan1 xi4 Xue2 yuan4], University of International Relations, Beijing
